title: The Man Who Saved Cincinnati
description: A thrilling history of the Queen City of the West during the Civil War.The Man Who Saved Cincinnati...Rescued the Queen City from a Confederate attack;Formed the first Black Brigade in the Union Army;Saved Washington, DC;Captured Billy the Kid and stopped a bloody range war;Wrote one of the greatest books in American literature, Ben-Hur. The secret plot to assassinate Abraham Lincoln in Cincinnati;Panic and threats from Morgan's Raiders;How the scapegoat of Shiloh became the Savior of Cincinnati.
author: Peter Bronson
